documents.content: Dheeraj Kumar Shukla is a Technical Architect with 14+ years of experience in .NET and ASP.NET Core, Azure/AWS cloud architecture, microservices, API Gateway, CI/CD, and system integration. He specializes in EV charging platforms using OCPI 2.2.1 and OCPP, Beckn protocol (BPP and BAP), IoT messaging with MQTT/RabbitMQ, and ERP integrations with SQL Server and MySQL.
